casebody.data:
RIEGER
v.
GIANT EAGLE, INC. 2018-0883 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 3, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion for admission pro hac vice of Scott D. Livingston. Motion granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel is ordered to file a notice of permission with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
